title: Relighting with free-form polarized reflectometry in mixed reality space.
abstract: We focus on a challenging trial of a Look-Change mixed reality (MR) space. Look refers to perceived ambience of an image created by illumination and color tone. Regarding the Look-Change, we have been working on a relighting technique which allows MR space to have additional virtual illumination. Furthermore, we demonstrate a photorealistic approach to create photorealistic virtual objects with free-form polarized reflectometry which requires no specialized hardware and is portable, thus making it easy apply to MR.
